author: Audrey Lim JC:
casenumber: High Court — Suit No 436 of 2010 (Registrar’s Appeal No 290 of 2018)
casename: Sunny Metal & Engineering Pte Ltd v Lee Xin Ben Jimmy (Serangoon Gardens Country Club, garnishee)
counsel: Lee Nyet Fah Alyssa (Alyssa Lee & Co) for the plaintiff;Toh Kok Seng and Chua Huimin, Michelle (Lee & Lee) for the garnishee.
tags: Credit and Security/Remedies/Garnishee orders/Garnishee issued cheque to judgment debtor to discharge debt before garnishee order served/Whether garnishee under obligation to stop payment on cheque
